yadi dhamma adhiṭṭhānena pucchita dhamma adhiṭṭhānena visajjayitabba

original: Yathā yathā vā pana pucchitaṁ tathā tathā visajjayitabbaṁ.
analyzed: yathā yathā vā pana pucchitam tathā tathā
tena āha āyasmā mahākaccāyano ekatta tāya dhamma ati
niyuttaḥ adhiṭṭhānaḥ hāro
